title: modern GREEK-ISH font
content:
Hello all,  
I'm trying to make a typeface which has GREEK historical references for the municipality of my town in Sicily. But it has to be practical as opposed to decorative.

Does anyone know of any existing fonts that look greek-ish yet modern? And that include lowercase chars? I'm just looking for inspiration and haven't found anything interesting.

Thanks for any suggestions.

J
author: alfa60
